topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a0c336636872252d001b7e#post_55a0c336636872252d001b7e
my point was that the singer of appalling spawn had this philosophy that his vocals were from a primal part of human instinct and that they evoked strong feelings that had laid dormant in humans for hundreds of years, and as it's a very difficult vocal style to even make a half assed attempt there's evidence suggesting that he's spent years trying to perfect it

and what you showed me was hackneyed and suffocatingly mediocre. i'm not saying it didn't work musically, but it's run of the mill boredom that makes me want to chop my dick in half and stab people with it. the vocals were nothing short of any other auto tuned singer other than maybe the fact that japanese is a much more melodic language than english and holy fuck that instrumentation

it's like they just didn't give a fuck

sure the violin in there was good but holy shit talk about a one track mind, the other instruments blew ass. just there for show, because who cares about putting emotion into things? we already have a singer rehashing what's popular! we don't need the instruments obscuring that genius!

now i know it's supposed to be accessible and shit like that and my taste has grown to dislike stuff so simple but come the fuck on that's no better than katy perry or justin beiber

innovation keeps music interesting, and if anything robotics are everything but
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

One of My Step-Dad's Family members is getting married.

And they live all the way in Carolina so my mom and step dad are going to have to drive all the way over there and back.

Because of this My Mom said they cant just spin money so they have to budget.

So we kind of skipped out grocery wise. All we really got is Eggs, and frozen meat. And a few other things I think?
